author: swertz
body:
#### PR description:

- Migrate NanoAODDQM away from `consumesMany` using `GetterOfProducts` as suggested in #40167
- Add the possibility to monitor individual bits of integer variables used as bitsets, by filling one entry per bit. Useful e.g. for trigger object filter bits affected in #40145 . Result:

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8058274/204511539-82a3fd0b-bb30-4768-95eb-1cb4cc3f55ba.png)

instead of 

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8058274/204511777-59eca6e6-d574-4cf4-913a-aa126a5a1935.png)


#### PR validation:

Elements of Nano matrix workflows
title: NanoDQM: remove consumesMany, plot bits in bitsets
